description: A mobile-first, TikTok/Reels-style brainrot website celebrating Michael's birthday with escalating visual and audio chaos, featuring white BMW references and maximum sensory overload

features.description: Project initializes with React, Vite, and Howler.js for audio management
steps: Run pnpm create vite with React template
Install howler.js dependency (^2.2.4)
Configure Vite for static asset handling (videos, audios, images)
Set up proper meta viewport for mobile (no pinch zoom)
Verify pnpm dev starts without errors

features.description: File structure matches spec.md layout
steps: Create /audios directory with audio files
Create /videos directory with video files
Create /images directory with BMW assets (bmw-white.png, bmw-logo.png)
Verify all media files are accessible via Vite static serving
Set up proper imports in main application file

features.description: Black Void Entry screen displays correctly
steps: Pure black screen (#000000) fills entire viewport
White 'TAP HERE' text centered on screen
Text possibly pulses subtly to draw attention
No loading indicators or other UI elements visible
Uses 100dvh for proper mobile address bar handling

features.description: First tap unlocks audio context and triggers chaos
steps: Entry gate waits for first user tap
Tap resumes AudioContext (iOS requirement)
Tap transitions from black void to chaos mode
Howler.js audio system initializes properly
No audio plays before first interaction

features.description: TikTok-style vertical video feed renders correctly
steps: Full-screen vertical video container
Videos display in 9:16 aspect ratio (vertical)
Videos loop infinitely
Videos auto-play after first tap interaction
Video fills viewport properly on mobile

features.description: Swipe navigation changes video content
steps: Swipe up loads next video from pool
Swipe down loads previous video from pool
Touch events are primary interaction method
Default scroll behavior is prevented
Custom swipe handling implemented

features.description: Audio chaos system triggers sounds on every interaction
steps: Random sound from pool plays on tap/click
Sound plays on scroll/swipe
Sound plays on touch move
Sounds play on any pointer event
Audio files auto-detected from /audios folder

features.description: Audio system enforces maximum simultaneous sounds
steps: Max 8 simultaneous sounds playing
Audio ducking when approaching limit
Sounds compress rather than clip
Oldest sounds fade out when limit reached
No audio blowout on rapid interactions

features.description: Time-based escalation system activates progressively over 10 seconds
steps: Chaos level 1 at 0-1s: Single video, basic audio
Chaos level 2 at 1-2s: Video starts duplicating (2-3 clones)
Chaos level 3 at 2-3s: Bouncing begins, slight screen shake
Chaos level 4 at 3-4s: Rotation/spinning on videos
Chaos level 5 at 4-5s: Color hue shifting begins
Chaos level 6 at 5-6s: Zoom pulses, more video clones
Chaos level 7 at 6-7s: Glitch overlays, playback speed changes
Chaos level 8 at 7-8s: Fake UI elements appear
Chaos level 9 at 8-9s: Random meme text spawning
Chaos level 10 at 9-10s: All effects at full intensity

features.description: Chaos level persists after reaching maximum
steps: After 10 seconds, chaos stays at level 10
Swiping changes video but chaos doesn't reset
No mechanism to decrease chaos level
'Happy Birthday' text starts appearing at max chaos
Session maintains chaos state

features.description: Video clones duplicate and multiply on screen
steps: Videos duplicate randomly based on chaos level
Each clone can have different transform properties
Max clones capped at 10-15 for performance
Clones spawn from different screen positions
Clone count increases with chaos level

features.description: Bouncing/movement uses DVD screensaver physics
steps: Videos bounce around screen with physics
Videos can escape edges and return unexpectedly
Random velocity changes occur
Bouncing intensity increases with chaos level
Uses requestAnimationFrame for smooth animation

features.description: Rotation and spinning effects apply to videos
steps: Random rotation angles applied to videos
Some videos spin continuously
Spin speed varies per video
Rotation activates at chaos level 4+
Uses CSS transforms for GPU acceleration

features.description: Screen shake effect intensifies with chaos level
steps: Subtle shake begins at chaos level 3
Uses CSS transform on body/container
Shake intensity increases with chaos level
Violent shaking at max chaos
Shake intervals: 50-100ms at maximum

features.description: Color manipulation effects including hue rotation
steps: Hue rotation creates rainbow cycling effect
Occasional color inversion
Saturation spikes occur randomly
Color effects activate at chaos level 5+
Full RGB spectrum used for chaos colors

features.description: Zoom pulses make elements breathe
steps: Elements scale from 1.0 to 1.1 to 1.0
Pulse frequency increases with chaos level
Individual elements can pulse independently
Pulse intervals: 0.3-0.8s with easing
Zoom pulses activate at chaos level 6+

features.description: Video playback speed changes randomly
steps: Videos randomly speed up (2x, 3x)
Videos randomly slow down (0.5x, 0.25x)
Optional reverse playback if supported
Playback speed changes at chaos level 7+
Different clones can have different speeds

features.description: Glitch and datamosh overlay effects
steps: CSS filters: contrast and brightness spikes
Chromatic aberration effect (RGB split)
Scan lines overlay
Random 'corruption' rectangles appear
Glitch effects activate at chaos level 7+

features.description: Fake UI breaking elements appear
steps: Fake error popups: 'ERROR: Too much brainrot'
Loading spinners that go nowhere
Fake 'buffering' indicators
'Your phone is overheating' fake warnings
Fake UI appears at chaos level 8+

features.description: Random meme text spawns float across screen
steps: Meme phrases spawn: SKIBIDI, OHIO, SIGMA, RIZZ, GYATT
Text floats across screen with random trajectories
Random sizes, rotations, and colors
Text spawns every 0.5-2s at max chaos
Max 20 floating texts for performance

features.description: Happy Birthday Michael text appears at max chaos
steps: White 'Happy Birthday Michael' text spawns randomly
Frequency increases after chaos level 10
Uses bold, white, sans-serif font (Impact style)
Text floats like other meme text
Distinct from other meme phrases

features.description: BMW integration with escalation-based appearance
steps: Level 3+: White BMW images start bouncing around
Level 5+: Text overlays: 'BMW GRINDSET', 'WHITE BMW ENERGY', 'M POWER'
Level 7+: BMW logo watermarks multiply
Level 10: Background flashes BMW dealership aesthetic (white/blue)
BMW Blue accent color: #0066B1

features.description: Performance caps prevent resource exhaustion
steps: Video clone cap: 15 max simultaneously
Sound cap: 8 simultaneous sounds
Text element cap: 20 floating texts max
Oldest elements removed when cap reached
Memory management for long sessions

features.description: Mobile optimizations for touch-first experience
steps: Touch events as primary interaction
Prevent default scroll behavior
Full viewport using 100dvh
No pinch zoom via meta viewport
Audio context resume on tap for iOS

features.description: CSS transforms used for GPU-accelerated animations
steps: All movement uses CSS transforms over position changes
Animations use requestAnimationFrame
GPU acceleration for smooth performance
Maintains playable FPS on modern phones
Optional effect reduction if frame drops detected

features.description: Typography follows spec visual style guide
steps: 'TAP HERE' and 'Happy Birthday': Bold white sans-serif (Impact)
Meme text: Mixed fonts for chaos (Comic Sans, Impact, Arial Black)
Fake errors: System font to look realistic
Primary text color: Pure white (#FFFFFF)
Base background: Deep black (#000000)

features.description: Project deployable to Cloudflare Pages
steps: Build produces static output compatible with Cloudflare Pages
All assets properly bundled or served
No server-side requirements
Proper caching headers for media files
Deployment configuration ready
